description:
Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard`s vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige
Jet Pistol of Anger! Luffy vs. Blackbeard!
Le Jet Pistol en colère. Luffy contre Barbe Noire.
Ярость реактивного пистолета! Луффи против Чёрной бороды!
مسدّس الغضب النفّاث! لوفي ضدّ اللّحية السّوداء!
怒りのJETピストル ルフィvs黒ヒゲ
